title: Replace header logo image with previously shared Linex Automation logo

requirements.text: Update the header logo element (XPath: /html/body/div/div/header/div/a/img) so it always renders the user-provided Linex Automation logo (served from `/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png`) and does not display the old generated logo (`/assets/generated/linex-logo.dim_512x512.png`).

quotes: i want you remove this logo and add my linex automation logo i shared with you before

acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeader.tsx`, the header logo `` uses `src={BRANDING.logo.main}` and `alt={BRANDING.logo.alt}` (no hardcoded old logo path).
The static asset `frontend/public/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png` exists in the deployed frontend build output and loads successfully (HTTP 200) when requested directly.
After deployment, the header logo displayed in the UI is the user-provided Linex Automation logo, not `linex-logo.dim_512x512.png`.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the selected element in the header (the logo at XPath /html/body/div/div/header/div/a/img).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not change footer branding/logo placement or any other UI elements beyond the selected header logo .
Do not introduce new authentication, backend changes, or new pages.
